name: PixelPauer vs the Cheeky Bros
description:
Oh god. another game, created with the impressive pocket-platformer from l0bster !
This time, dedicated to my favorite Twitch streamer PixelPauer.

Just an ordinary weekend. Theoretically. PixelPauer is on the way to Amy and everything could be perfect - but the Cheeky-Brothers twart his plan. Sucked into the booty dimension, he is now on his way, always watched by the brown eye of evil. 

This game has everything: Traps, holograms and a final boss duo - the cheeky brothers! (Somehow they look like Ben Affleck). It gets harder from level to level, making the dibolical, vertical grin of the cheeky brothers even bigger. They  want Pixelpauer to stay with them, so they don´t even hesitate to break the game. (whoa - how meta!)

Can he escape the brothers' diabolical cheeks or is the weekend screwed up? You decide.

Features:

  • the most heroic hero of the northern hemisphere
  • finally, a female Sprite!
  • holograms
  • fake walls
  • Cheeks, only a mother can love. Or Sir Mix-a-lot.
  • 6 challenging levels
  • a final boss
  • and the hell of a booty (or a booty from hell?)
